DamageImmunities: Poison, Bludgeoning, Slashing and Piercing from non-magical weapons

Traits.Name: Tidal Omen
Traits.Content: The Muru radiates an aura of dread. Creatures within 30 feet must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become stunned until the end of their next turn as they are overwhelmed by visions of drowning.

Traits.Name: Ambiguous Presence
Traits.Content: Creatures that start their turn within 10 feet of the Muru must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on saving throws against being frightened and must use their action to dash away from the Muru until they are outside of this range.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Muru makes two attacks: one with Grasp of the Deep and one with Saltwater Breath.

Actions.Name: Grasp of the Deep
Actions.Content: Melee Spell Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 until the end of its next turn as it feels the weight of the ocean closing in on it.

Actions.Name: Saltwater Breath (Recharge 5â€“6)
Actions.Content: The Muru exhales a cone of brackish mist in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn, as they choke on the brine flooding their senses. While poisoned in this way, a target takes 5 (1d10) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns.

Actions.Name: Wail of the Forgotten (1/Day)
Actions.Content: The Muru emits an echoing wail, carrying its lament across the battlefield. Each creature within 20 feet must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn, overwhelmed by feelings of loss and despair.
